data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during NAUTILUS cruise from Prince Rupert Bay to Rhode Island started at 1794-04-18

Ship: Nautilus (Sloop), Voyage: Prince Ruperts Bay Dominica - Rhode Island, 1st Observer: Henry Bayntun (Captain), 2nd Observer: Edward Berry (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 24G 337BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
